pages.terms: Indian Culinary School | Spice Trail Academy | Chef Training Courses | Terms and Conditions Home Courses FAQ Email us Terms and Conditions Welcome to Spice Trail Academy's website. By accessing and using our website, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before using our website or enrolling in any of our courses. Acceptance of Terms By accessing, browsing, or using this website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, you must refrain from using our website and services. Website Use The content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, images, audio, and video, is the property of Spice Trail Academy and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may view and use the website solely for your personal, non-commercial purposes. Any unauthorized use, reproduction, distribution, or modification of the website content is strictly prohibited. Course Enrollment and Fees To enroll in any of our courses, you must complete the registration process and pay the applicable fees. Course fees are non-refundable unless explicitly stated otherwise. Spice Trail Academy reserves the right to change course fees and schedules at any time without prior notice. Intellectual Property All intellectual property rights, including copyrights, trademarks, and trade secrets, related to the content, materials, and services provided by Spice Trail Academy are owned by the academy or its licensors. You may not use, reproduce, distribute, or modify any of our intellectual property without our prior written consent. User Conduct You agree to use our website and services in a lawful and appropriate manner. You must not engage in any activities that may disrupt or interfere with the website's operation, or that may violate the rights of others. Spice Trail Academy reserves the right to terminate or suspend your access to the website or its services if you violate these terms or engage in any unlawful or inappropriate conduct. Limitation of Liability Spice Trail Academy shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of your use or inability to use our website or services. We make no warranties or representations regarding the accuracy, reliability, or availability of the website or its content. Indemnification You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Spice Trail Academy, its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, or expenses, including reasonable attorney's fees, arising out of your use of our website or services, or your violation of these Terms and Conditions. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites or resources. Spice Trail Academy does not endorse or assume any responsibility for the content, accuracy, or availability of such external sites or resources. Use of third-party websites or resources is at your own risk. Governing Law and Jurisdiction These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws. Any disputes arising out of or relating to these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located. Changes to Terms and Conditions Spice Trail Academy reserves the right to modify or update these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of our website and services after any such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated terms. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions or our website, please contact us at: spicetrailacademy@gmail.com Rajouri Garden, Delhi, 110027, India spicetrailacademy@gmail.com +91 11 4503 5783 Home Courses FAQ Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions

pages.courses: Indian Culinary School | Spice Trail Academy | Chef Training Courses | Courses Home Courses FAQ Email us Our cooking courses Mastering Indian Curries Explore the rich diversity of Indian curries, from the aromatic kormas to the fiery vindaloos. Learn the art of blending spices and mastering traditional cooking techniques. ₹25,000 Choose Tandoor and Bread Making Unlock the secrets of tandoor cooking and discover the art of making authentic Indian breads like naan, roti, and parathas. ₹20,000 Choose Regional Indian Cuisines Embark on a culinary journey through the diverse regional cuisines of India, from the spicy Chettinad dishes to the rich Mughlai delicacies. ₹30,000 Choose Indian Vegetarian Cooking Explore the vibrant world of Indian vegetarian cuisine, from classic dals and curries to innovative plant-based dishes. ₹18,000 Choose Indian Desserts and Sweets Indulge in the rich and diverse world of Indian desserts and sweets, from the creamy rasmalai to the decadent gulab jamun. ₹15,000 Choose Spice Blending and Masalas Master the art of blending spices and creating authentic Indian masalas that form the backbone of flavorful curries and dishes. ₹12,000 Choose Indian Street Food Discover the vibrant world of Indian street food, from the iconic chaat varieties to the mouthwatering kebabs and snacks. ₹18,000 Choose Indian Culinary Immersion An all-encompassing program that covers the diverse aspects of Indian cuisine, from curries and breads to desserts and regional specialties. ₹50,000 Choose Immerse Yourself in the Flavors of India Explore Our Comprehensive Course Offerings At Spice Trail Academy, we take pride in offering a diverse range of courses that cater to every level of culinary expertise, from enthusiastic home cooks to aspiring professional chefs. Our meticulously designed programs are crafted to provide you with a holistic understanding of the rich and diverse culinary traditions of India. Whether you seek to master the art of blending spices and creating authentic masalas, or delve into the intricate techniques of tandoor cooking and bread making, our courses have something for everyone. Explore the vibrant world of regional Indian cuisines, from the fiery Chettinad dishes to the rich Mughlai delicacies, or indulge in the decadent realm of Indian desserts and sweets. Our expert instructors, who are renowned chefs themselves, guide you through hands-on classes, sharing their wealth of knowledge and passion for Indian flavors. You'll not only learn the culinary techniques but also gain a deep appreciation for the cultural and historical significance behind each dish. Beyond the technical aspects, our courses foster a sense of community, where you'll have the opportunity to connect with like-minded individuals, exchange ideas, and create lasting friendships bound by a shared love for Indian cuisine. Whether you're a novice or an experienced chef, our courses are designed to challenge and inspire you. Step into our state-of-the-art kitchens, and let the aromas of spices and the sizzle of the tandoor ignite your culinary journey. Enroll today and embark on a flavorful adventure that will transform your perception of Indian cuisine. Address Rajouri Garden, Delhi, 110027, India Email spicetrailacademy@gmail.com Phone +91 11 4503 5783 Get in Touch with Us Have a question, need more information about our courses, or ready to enroll? Our friendly admissions team is here to assist you. Simply fill out the form below, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. At Spice Trail Academy, we value open communication and are dedicated to providing an exceptional experience from the moment you express interest in our programs. Whether you're a prospective student, a culinary enthusiast, or a industry professional, we're here to support you on your culinary journey. Don't hesitate to reach out to us with any inquiries or concerns. Our knowledgeable staff is always ready to address your questions and provide you with the guidance you need to make an informed decision about your culinary education. We look forward to hearing from you and helping you take the first step towards mastering the art of Indian cuisine. pages.faq: Indian Culinary School | Spice Trail Academy | Chef Training Courses | frequently asked questions Home Courses FAQ Email us Have Any Questions Ask without hesitation What makes Spice Trail Academy unique? At Spice Trail Academy, we pride ourselves on our unwavering commitment to preserving and promoting the authentic flavors and techniques of Indian cuisine. Our experienced instructors are not only renowned chefs but also passionate advocates of India's rich culinary heritage. What level of experience is required to enroll? Our courses cater to a wide range of skill levels, from complete beginners to seasoned professionals. Whether you're a novice home cook or an experienced chef looking to expand your repertoire, we have programs tailored to meet your needs. Do you offer hands-on training? Absolutely! We firmly believe in the power of hands-on learning. Our state-of-the-art teaching kitchens provide the perfect environment for you to practice and hone your skills under the guidance of our expert chefs. What types of courses do you offer? Our course offerings cover a wide range of topics, including mastering Indian curries, tandoor cooking, bread making, regional cuisines, vegetarian cooking, desserts and sweets, spice blending, and street food, among others. How long are the courses? The duration of our courses varies depending on the program you choose. We offer short-term workshops, multi-week courses, and comprehensive immersion programs spanning several months. Do you provide any certifications? Yes, upon successful completion of our courses, students receive a certificate from Spice Trail Academy, attesting to their skills and knowledge in the respective areas of study. Are there any age restrictions? Our courses are open to individuals of all ages, provided they have a genuine interest in learning about Indian cuisine. However, some programs may have specific age requirements, which will be clearly stated in the course descriptions. Can I take multiple courses at once? Absolutely! We encourage our students to explore various aspects of Indian cuisine by enrolling in multiple courses concurrently. Our scheduling is designed to accommodate students who wish to take advantage of our diverse offerings. What is the class size? We maintain small class sizes to ensure personalized attention and a hands-on learning experience for each student. Our classes typically range from 8 to 12 students, allowing for ample interaction with the instructors and fellow classmates. Do you offer any discounts or financial aid? Yes, we understand that culinary education can be a significant investment. We offer various discounts and financial aid options to make our courses more accessible. Please contact our admissions office for more information. Can I visit your facilities before enrolling? Absolutely! We welcome prospective students to visit our campus and take a tour of our state-of-the-art kitchens and facilities. This allows you to experience our learning environment firsthand and get a better understanding of what Spice Trail Academy has to offer. Do you assist with job placement after completing a course? While we do not directly offer job placement services, our dedicated career counseling team works closely with students to provide guidance and support in pursuing their culinary aspirations. We also maintain strong connections with the industry, which can open doors to potential job opportunities. Can I learn about dietary restrictions or special diets? Yes, we understand the importance of accommodating dietary restrictions and special diets. Our instructors are well-versed in catering to various dietary needs, whether it's vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, or any other specific requirements. Simply let us know your preferences, and we'll ensure that our classes cater to your needs. Do you offer any online or virtual courses? While we strongly believe in the value of hands-on, in-person training, we are exploring the possibility of offering select online courses or virtual workshops in the future. Stay tuned for updates on our website or sign up for our newsletter to be notified of any new developments. How can I stay updated on your latest course offerings and events? The best way to stay informed about our latest course offerings, events, and updates is by subscribing to our newsletter and following us on social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. We regularly share news, culinary tips, and special promotions through these channels. Why People Choose Us At Spice Trail Academy, we pride ourselves on providing an exceptional culinary education experience that sets us apart from the rest. Our commitment to excellence, coupled with our passion for preserving and promoting the rich heritage of Indian cuisine, has made us the preferred choice for aspiring chefs and food enthusiasts alike. 01 Experienced and Renowned Faculty Our instructors are not only highly skilled chefs but also experts in their respective fields, with years of experience in the culinary industry. 02 State-of-the-Art Facilities Our academy boasts state-of-the-art kitchens and teaching facilities, equipped with the latest culinary technology and equipment. 03 Hands-On Learning Experience We believe in the power of hands-on learning, which is why our courses are designed to provide ample opportunities for practical application. 04 Comprehensive Curriculum Our curriculum is meticulously crafted to cover all aspects of Indian cuisine, from the intricate art of spice blending to the diverse regional specialties. Unlock Your Passion for Indian Flavors At Spice Trail Academy, we believe that cooking is an art form, and Indian cuisine is a masterpiece waiting to be unveiled. Our academy is more than just a place to learn recipes; it's a sanctuary where you'll embark on a transformative journey, discovering the rich tapestry of flavors, aromas, and techniques that make Indian food truly exceptional. Join us, and let our expert instructors guide you through the intricate art of spice blending, the ancient traditions of tandoor cooking, and the diverse regional cuisines that have captivated the world's palate for centuries. Whether you're a passionate home cook or an aspiring professional chef, our courses are designed to ignite your senses and elevate your culinary skills to new heights. Explore Our Course Offerings Rajouri Garden, Delhi, 110027, India spicetrailacademy@gmail.com +91 11 4503 5783 Home Courses FAQ Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions

pages.privacy: Indian Culinary School | Spice Trail Academy | Chef Training Courses | Privacy Policy Home Courses FAQ Email us Privacy Policy At Spice Trail Academy, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our website visitors and students. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the personal information you provide to us through our website or during the course of your enrollment and studies with us. Information We Collect We may collect personal information from you when you visit our website, complete an online form, register for a course, or communicate with us through various channels. This information may include, but is not limited to: Name Email address Phone number Mailing address Payment information Educational and professional background Dietary preferences or restrictions Additionally, our website may automatically collect certain technical information, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, and usage data, to improve our services and enhance your user experience. Use of Your Information We use the personal information you provide for the following purposes: To process your course enrollment and manage your academic record To communicate with you regarding your studies, updates, and events To process payments and handle financial transactions To personalize and improve your experience on our website To comply with legal obligations and regulatory requirements To send you marketing communications and promotional offers (with your consent) Data Security We take the security of your personal information seriously and employ industry-standard measures to protect it from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include, but are not limited to, encryption, firewalls, and access controls. Third-Party Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website, processing payments, or delivering our services. These third parties are obligated to keep your information confidential and secure, and they are prohibited from using it for any other purpose. Cookies and Tracking Technologies Our website may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience and collect analytics data. You can adjust your browser settings to manage or disable cookies if you prefer. Children's Privacy Our website and services are not intended for children under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children without parental consent. Your Rights You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information held by Spice Trail Academy. You may also opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time. To exercise these rights or for any other privacy-related inquiries, please contact our Data Protection Officer Updates to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any updates or changes. Contact Us If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data handling practices, please contact us at: spicetrailacademy@gmail.com Rajouri Garden, Delhi, 110027, India spicetrailacademy@gmail.com +91 11 4503 5783 Home Courses FAQ Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
